name: Orc
description: Orcs are known for their prodigious strength and aggression. They live a harsh, warlike existence, driven by the need to prove their might.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action on your turn, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.
